media:group.media:title: Tech's Biggest Losers in 2022 | Comparison
media:group.media:description:
This video visualizes the largest decrease in market value by tech companies from the start of 2022. It is a visual comparison of these losses using stacks of $100 dollar bills. These huge losses were expected after the meteoric rise of their market cap during the pandemic. This increase in value was unsustainable and only temporary because of pandemic. It included the largest companies such as Apple, Tesla, Amazon, etc.

Comparison: Tech's Biggest Losers in 2022
#Comparison #Tech #Tesla
